attacks.name: Payback
attacks.effect: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage and discard the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Ground Burn
attacks.effect: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 80 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
